column3: We know that to be successful five years, 10 years, 20 years from now, we need to create more resilience in our business. We can help define for the world what it means to be a truly sustainable company, and build a stronger, more resilient future for us all. In September 2021 we launched a strategic, end-to-end transformation of our business. We put sustainability and human capital at the center of how we will create growth and value, by operating within planetary boundaries and inspiring positive change for the planet and people.
